about_the_game:
Welcome to Velocity Rush, a racing game that will take you to a world of high speeds, bright colors and endless adrenaline! Choose from six unique cars, each with its own features and driving style. Compete against artificial rivals that adapt to your driving style and make your way through challenging tracks that require skill and lightning-fast reactions.

The game features incredible visual effects stylized as futuristic neon and a soundtrack that will make your heart beat faster. Each race is a test of your reactions and your ability to keep your cool at extreme speeds. Will you be able to become the champion by overtaking all your rivals?

Game Features:

- Six unique cars with different speed and control characteristics.

- Complex tracks that require both a strategic approach and lightning-fast reaction.

- Artificial intelligence of opponents, adapting to your style of play.

- Stylized visual style inspired by neon and futuristic design.

- Speed gameplay designed for adrenaline junkies.

- A challenge mode where you can test your skills against the clock.

- Exciting soundtrack, perfect for high-speed racing.

name: Velocity Rush

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Velocity Rush is a fast-paced racing game with breathtaking speeds and a stylish visual design. Challenge yourself by competing against smart opponents, choose one of six unique cars, and conquer complex tracks filled with vibrant colors and adrenaline.
